external
Class Naccess

java.lang.Object
  external.Naccess

public class Naccess
extends java.lang.Object

Class making use of functionality provided by Simon Hubbard's NACCESS application.

Since:
3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Abdullah Kahraman

Constructor Detail

Naccess

public Naccess(java.lang.String naccessPath)
        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Constructor.

Parameters:
naccessPath - String holding the path to the NACCESS application.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if NACCESS application can not be found at given path.
Method Detail

run

public final boolean run(java.lang.String pdbFileName)
Runs NACCESS and stores the residue and atom accessibility files in a ReadFile object.

Parameters:
pdbFileName - String holding the path to the PDB file of the protein of which the total SAS is to be calculated.
Returns:
TRUE if execution of NACCESS was successful, FALSE otherwise.

getTotalSolventAccessibility

public final double getTotalSolventAccessibility()
Returns the total solvent accessible surface area of the protein, which is found in the TOTAL line of NACCESS's *.rsa files.

Returns:
double value, representing the total SASA. If no information on the total SASA can be found in the .rsa file, then -1 will be returned.

setSolventAccessibility

public final void setSolventAccessibility(java.util.ArrayList<AminoAcid> aminoAcids)
Sets the solvent accessibility of each amino acid.

Parameters:
aminoAcids - List of AminoAcid objects for which the SASA is to be extracted.
